allow: Bash(node -e "const m = require\(''multer''\); console.log\(''memoryStorage:'', typeof m.memoryStorage\); console.log\(''diskStorage:'', typeof m.diskStorage\); const u = m\({ storage: m.memoryStorage\(\) }\); console.log\(''single:'', typeof u.single\); console.log\(''array:'', typeof u.array\); console.log\(''fields:'', typeof u.fields\); console.log\(''none:'', typeof u.none\); console.log\(''Multer 2.x basic API is compatible''\)")
